scripts.info: echo 'Simple JS for Apps, supports defer/async and uses native JS with no external libs'
scripts.build: echo '=> Build All' && npm run build:dev && uglifyjs -c drop_console=true dist/simple.dev.js -o dist/simple.js && minify dist/simple.js && rm dist/simple.js && sed -i "s/{version}/$(cat VERSION)/g" dist/*
scripts.build:dev: echo '=> Build Dev' && cat src/start.inc src/app.js src/end.inc > dist/simple.dev.js
